BasicExamples.StructuralDirective: Using a structural directive is the recommended approach.
BasicExamples.Pipe: The second option is to use the transloco pipe.
BasicExamples.AttributeDirective: The last option is to use transloco attribute directive.
BasicExamples.Service: Use the Translation API in your services.

MessageFormatExamples.AppleCount: {count, plural, =0 {no apples} one {an apple} other {# apples}}
